title: Three... Extremes
director: Fruit Chan, Takashi Miike, Chan-wook Park
writer: Haruko Fukushima (segment), Pik Wah Lee (segment), Chan-wook Park (segment), Bun Saikou (story), Bobby White (subtitles)
actors: Bai Ling, Pauline Lau, Tony Ka Fai Leung, Meme Tian
plot: An Asian cross-cultural trilogy of horror films from accomplished indie directors.
